about_the_game:
This is a roguelike game where you upgrade your weapons to fend off waves of zombies.
You must survive alone or with your teammates against zombies swarming into your house. The number of zombies increases with each passing day, and stronger ones appear, but you can also become stronger. How you grow stronger is up to you. Try to survive as long as possible and escape!

Combat

Attacking with guns is safe, but ammunition is limited, so be careful. Sometimes, you’ll need to use a bat for melee attacks.

Game Flow

After eliminating a zombie horde or surviving for a set period, you can enhance yourself and face the next wave. The time of day progresses through morning, afternoon, and night, with powerful zombies appearing at night. Each day you survive grants you a chance to escape.

Upgrades

After each battle, you can choose one of three random options to enhance your abilities or weapons.
  • Increase health
  • Increase movement speed
  • Melee weapons with fire
  • Bullets that pierce through enemies
  • Bullets with electric shocks

Number of Players

You can fight alone or form a team of up to four players to cooperate.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains gunfire, violence, and bloodshed against zombies.

name: Zombie House Siege
short_description: This game is a roguelike where you continuously fend off zombies by upgrading your gun. Survive the waves of zombies storming the house with your allies! As the days pass, more zombies will appear, including powerful ones, but you will grow stronger too.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean
